title: [信息|聊天][PCD]ChatColor —— 让你的玩家自己改变自己的聊天颜色吧[1.10-1.12]

 功能  1.可以配合BS**的相应的彩色权限.
2.可以自定义各类权限.



 命令:  /cc &/ChatColor —— 打开面板.
/ChatClear —— 取消颜色显示

 配置文件   哪位大神翻译一下，我感激不尽，我实在是不想看了。
Chat-Color-Permission: Chat.Color
Chat-Clear-Permission: Chat.Clear
Chat-Format: '&7%Player% &8&l:&f '
No-Permission-Message: '&cYou do not have permission to do this!'
#颜色控制面板打开权限
Inventory-GUI-Open-Permission: Chat.Inventory.Open
#所有颜色权限
Inventory-GUI-Color-All-Permission: Chat.Inventory.*
#一下颜色对应相应的颜色代码
Inventory-GUI-Color-1-Permission: Chat.Inventory.1
Inventory-GUI-Color-2-Permission: Chat.Inventory.2
Inventory-GUI-Color-3-Permission: Chat.Inventory.3
Inventory-GUI-Color-4-Permission: Chat.Inventory.4
Inventory-GUI-Color-5-Permission: Chat.Inventory.5
Inventory-GUI-Color-6-Permission: Chat.Inventory.6
Inventory-GUI-Color-7-Permission: Chat.Inventory.7
Inventory-GUI-Color-8-Permission: Chat.Inventory.8
Inventory-GUI-Color-9-Permission: Chat.Inventory.9
Inventory-GUI-Color-0-Permission: Chat.Inventory.0
Inventory-GUI-Color-a-Permission: Chat.Inventory.a
Inventory-GUI-Color-b-Permission: Chat.Inventory.b
Inventory-GUI-Color-c-Permission: Chat.Inventory.c
Inventory-GUI-Color-d-Permission: Chat.Inventory.d
Inventory-GUI-Color-e-Permission: Chat.Inventory.e
Inventory-GUI-Color-f-Permission: Chat.Inventory.f
Staff-Chat-Format: '&8[&9颜色&8] &7%Player% &8&l:&b '
Staff-Chat-Permission: Chat.StaffChat
Use-Grammar-Permission: Chat.Grammar
Grammar-Toggle-Permission: Chat.Grammar.Toggle
